title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Nov 17 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Nov 17 2021
description:
The left supports jury intimidation. Why do liberals need Rittenhouse to be guilty? OSHA suspends Biden vaccine mandate, that doesn't mean Democrats will stop their mandate madness. Red states need to protect businesses from federal mandates. The media will continue to spin the Rittenhouse trial to fit their narrative. C&B take calls on covid mandates. No verdict on the Rittenhouse trial. Obama economic advisor Steven Rattner: I warned Democrats about inflation. Why didn't they listen? Democrat congress confronts key issue: anime!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck
